# 安装

## crawler_studio 安装crawler_studio，启动后会出现一个可视化爬虫管理界面 ` pip install crawler_studio ` 安装完后在控制台输入: ` cs ` 如果能看到如下输出, 说明安装成功

``` Type ‘cs help <subcommand>’ for help on a specific subcommand.

Available subcommands:

[auth]

changepassword createsuperuser

[authtoken]

drf_create_token

[contenttypes]

remove_stale_contenttypes …

```

## cs_sender 安装 cs_sender，这个安装包用于Scrapy爬虫上传运行数据 ` pip install cs_sender `

crawler_studio
